page.title: 16FAVOURITE GAMES 2.
page.content: {Tig.}The game is played by a group of children.One person has to be on.The people have a den.The person that is on stays by the den.The people on the den try to get off.If the person "tigs" someone by touching them he is on.Those caught run after more people.They run and run until all of the people are tigged. {Akey 1.2.3.}Our Akey post is a lamp post.Whoever is on has to count to 100 while all the other people go and hide.If the person that is on does not want to be on again you can say "No fools around me."The person who is on have to find the people who have hidden.When he or she has found someone they have to run back to the post and shout "Akey 1.2.3."The last one has to try to find the first one so that the other person is on again.
